segments.en: Linked Discourses 1
4. The Satullapa Group
31. Virtuous
So I have heard.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā satullapakāyikā devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
segments.en: Then, late at night, several glorious deities of the Satullapa Group, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, stood to one side,

segments.pli: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho ekā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: and recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
things get better, not worse.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
wisdom is gained—but not from anyone else.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
you don’t sorrow even among those who sorrow.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
you shine among your relatives.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sentient beings go to a good place.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
segments.en: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
“Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sentient beings live happily.”

segments.pli: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then another deity said to the Buddha,
“Sir, who has spoken well?”

segments.pli: “Sabbāsaṃ vo subhāsitaṃ pariyāyena, api ca mamapi suṇātha—
segments.en: “You’ve all spoken well in your own way. However, listen to me also:
Associate only with the virtuous!
Try to get close to the virtuous!
Understanding the true teaching of the good,
you’re released from all suffering.”
That is what the Buddha said.

segments.pli: Attamanā tā devatāyo bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsūti.
segments.en: Then those deities, knowing that the teacher approved, bowed and respectfully circled the Buddha, keeping him on their right, before vanishing right there.

suttaplex.blurb: A series of deities give verses praising association with the good, and the Buddha gives his own response.
